channel.title: Please lock or remove
channel.description:
Hello, I have been trying to set up a private server, I had set up a few 317's lately but I decided to put up a 500+ server, 508, and when I click "Run" to start the server, It says this:
Exeption in Thread "Main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutofboundsExeption: 17 at net.com.canownueasy.World.Items.Items.Loaditemlist(items.java: 335) at net.com.canownueasy.World.Items.ITems.(init)(Items.Java: 26) at net.com.canownueasy.Engine.(init)(Engine.Java: 109) at net.com.canownueasy.Server.Main(Server.Java: 61) Press any key to continue... I had to re-Code the Batch file before i did this, Before this it sayed something like that but Longer and More complicated O.O I re-coded it and the code is:
@echo off title *******(trying my best not to Advertize my server so I stared it out) cd ../class java -Xmx512m -cp .; net/com/canownueasy/Server 43594 pause Yet this is on MY computer, and I am soon going to put transferr it to my Server so it may do something different, Can anyone help me with this? thanks :)
Nevermind..I got a new Server =P plz lock or remove

item.title: Please lock or remove
item.dc:creator: @Gollo Gollo
item.description:
@Gollo wrote:

You are using ScapeRune 513?

Read full topic

item.title: Please lock or remove
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Hello, I have been trying to set up a private server, I had set up a few 317’s lately but I decided to put up a 500+ server, 508, and when I click “Run” to start the server, It says this:

Exeption in Thread “Main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutofboundsExeption: 17
at net.com.canownueasy.World.Items.Items.Loaditemlist(items.java: 335)
at net.com.canownueasy.World.Items.ITems.(init)(Items.Java: 26)
at net.com.canownueasy.Engine.(init)(Engine.Java: 109)
at net.com.canownueasy.Server.Main(Server.Java: 61)
Press any key to continue…
I had to re-Code the Batch file before i did this,
Before this it sayed something like that but Longer and More complicated O.O
I re-coded it and the code is:

@echo off
title *******(trying my best not to Advertize my server so I stared it out)
cd …/class
java -Xmx512m -cp .; net/com/canownueasy/Server 43594
pause
Yet this is on MY computer, and I am soon going to put transferr it to my Server so it may do something different, Can anyone help me with this? thanks

Nevermind…I got a new Server =P plz lock or remove

Read full topic
